Teacher gone programmer,

gamer and life long learner

Born and raised in the United States and moved to Madrid Spain at 20 years old and graduated from Universidad Compluetnse de Madird with a teaching degree. Over the course of 17 years in education I have shifted towards education innovation, teacher training and curriculum design, focused primarily on games and gamification. My passion for teaching and learning has led me to the world of programming. Within this portfolio you can see my skills and projects with front-end web development.
